rasterizer.title: Rasterizer
description: Implemented a rasterizer that converts Scalable Vector Graphic (SVG) files into pixeled images.
Tested various methods of pixel sampling for texture mapping.

meshEdit.title: Mesh Edit
description: Simulated the physics of cloth by creating a mesh of springs and point masses.
Used verlet integration and other formulas to compute new positions.

pathTracer.title: Pathtracer
description: Produced renderings of 3D environments using ray intersections and bounding volume hierarchies.
Added support for direct and global illumination using Monte Carlo Path Tracing.

pathTracer2.title: Pathtracer 2
description: Simulated mirror and glass materials in a 3D environment using ray refraction/reflection.
Completed a thin-lens model capable of depth refocusing using ray intersections.
